main event: An observer in Lincoln, Nebraska reported seeing a bright white object moving rapidly in the sky on August 12, 1959.
interesting points: The object was seen approximately 700 times over the course of 25 minutes., It moved very rapidly and changed direction frequently., The object was round and bright white, fading to orange before disappearing., The observer was using binoculars before switching to the naked eye for observation., The weather was clear with gusty winds during the sighting.
sighted object: one bright white round object which faded to orange
witness description: William J. Jacobs, SSGT, 98th Air Refueling Squadron
